page.title: 14PATHHEAD:HOUSING
page.content:
THERE ARE 360 HOUSES IN PATHHEAD VILLAGE, SOME OF WHICH DATE BACK TO THE 16th CENTURY. IN RECENT YEARS MANY NEW HOUSES HAVE BEEN BUILT ON THE WEST SIDE OF THE VILLAGE. THESE HOUSES ARE COUNCUL OWNED AND MAKE UP MORE THAN 2/3 OF THE HOUSES IN THE VILLAGE. THE OLDEST HOUSES ARE TO BE FOUND IN THE MAIN STREET AND AS PATHHEAD IS IN A CONSERVATION AREA MANY OF THE HOUSES RETAIN THE ORIGINAL STONE WORK AND FEATURES. THE AGES OF THE HOUSES CAN BE BROKEN DOWN INTO 5 AGE GROUPS.
SEE TABLE ON NEXT PAGE
